ds_id: Meta Platforms, Inc. (NASDAQ:META) Receives Consensus Rating of "Moderate Buy" from Analysts@MarketBeat@2023-06-25 10:34:30.701118@Meta
data_content: Meta Platforms has been rated a "Moderate Buy" by brokerages, with an average one-year price target of $249.07. Several recent research reports have boosted their price target for Meta Platforms, with values ranging from $265.00 to $320.00. The company's stock opened at $288.73 on Friday, with a market cap of $739.94 billion. Meta Platforms' quarterly earnings topped estimates, posting $2.64 earnings per share. Insider activity reported includes the sale of shares by various company officials, resulting in a total transaction of approximately $9,240,685 over the last three months. Institutional investors and hedge funds recently made changes to their positions in the company, with 62.54% of the stock now owned by these entities.
